fields.name: ConsumerGroupName
fields.description: The name of an Event Hub Consumer Group that should be used to read events from the Event Hub. Specifying distinct consumer group names for multiple inputs allows each of those inputs to receive the same events from the Event Hub. If not specified, the input uses the Event Hubâ€™s default consumer group.

fields.name: EventHubName
fields.description: The name of the Event Hub. Required on PUT (CreateOrReplace) requests.

fields.name: ServiceBusNamespace
fields.description: The namespace that is associated with the desired Event Hub, Service Bus Queue, Service Bus Topic, etc. Required on PUT (CreateOrReplace) requests.

fields.name: SharedAccessPolicyKey
fields.description: The shared access policy key for the specified shared access policy. Required on PUT (CreateOrReplace) requests.

fields.name: SharedAccessPolicyName
fields.description: The shared access policy name for the Event Hub, Service Bus Queue, Service Bus Topic, etc. Required on PUT (CreateOrReplace) requests.
